job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van schaalbare en veilige back-end oplossingen met behulp van ASP.NET Core en Python.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and maintaining software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en bouwen van RESTful API's voor integratie met verschillende front-end systemen.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building APIs is a fundamental software development task for system integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration on designing solutions using established software design principles (SOLID, MVC) falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: Supporting integration of backend services within a microservice architecture is a software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken met Azure voor deployment, resource management en schaalbaarheid.
job_tasks.justification: Managing deployment, resources, and scalability on a cloud platform like Azure aligns with operations and infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan CI/CD-processen met GitHub Actions en versiebeheer met GitHub.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to CI/CD processes and version control is a core aspect of operations and deployment pipelines.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on traditional back-end development tasks, API design, and general software engineering principles. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, or any of the specific generative AI technologies or tasks outlined in the GenAI Engineer profile. The skills and technologies listed are standard for a Back-End Developer role.
